Body:
example_directory_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)
    ) + '/example_projects'
fizzbuzz_directory = example_directory_path + '/fizzbuzz/example_tests'
broken_fizzbuzz_directory = (example_directory_path +
    '/broken_fizzbuzz/example_tests')
directory_dictionaries = get_tests(example_directory_path, 'example_tests')
return Expect(directory_dictionaries).to_equal([{'directory':
    broken_fizzbuzz_directory, 'modules': ['test_broken']}, {'directory':
    fizzbuzz_directory, 'modules': ['test_logic']}])
